TopicTitle: KSP UI asset bundle building vs PopupDialog - run-time UI element addition

Articles.Content:
Is it possible to create a UI asset bundle and use it so KSP plugin can add new UI elements at run-time (maybe copy existing UI element and adding it into existing hierarchy) ?

So far, none of the tutorials mention such a possibility. Asset bundles appear to be static constructs.

In my case, i will need arbitrary number of labels and sliders in vertical scrollable list.

May be misunderstanding your question but - have you seen this tutorial?

Shows how to create a UI in Unity and connect it to plugin code.
